text: Entrance to the Kachin State Hluttaw. Kachin State Hluttaw () is the legislature of Kachin State in Myanmar (Burma). It is a unicameral body, consisting of 53 members, including 40 elected members and 13 military representatives. As of February 2016, the Hluttaw was led by speaker Tun Tin of the National League for Democracy (NLD). {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="7" |Seats of Kachin State Hluttaw by Parties (November 2010) |- !Party !Seats !Net Gain/Loss !Seats % !Votes % !Votes !+/- |- |USDP |20 | |39.22 | | | |- |NUP |11 | |21.57 | | | |- |SNLD |4 | |7.84 | | | |- |UDPKS |2 | |3.92 | | | |- |Independent |1 | |1.96 | | | |- |Military appointees |13 | |25.49 | | | |- |Total |51 | |100 | | | |} {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="7" |Seats of Kachin State Hluttaw by Parties (result of November 2015) |- !Party !Seats !Net Gain/Loss !Seats % !Votes % !Votes !+/- |- |NLD |26 |26 |48.15 | | | |- |USDP |7 |13 |13.21 | | | |- |KSDP |3 |3 |5.66 | | | |- |SNLD |1 |3 |1.89 | | | |- |LNDP |2 |2 |3.77 | | | |- |UDPKS |1 |1 |1.89 | | | |- |Military appointees |13 | |24.53 | | | |- |Total |53 | |100 | | | |} ==General Election results (Nov. 2015)== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Party !Seats !+/– |- |align=left|National League for Democracy (NLD)||26||26 |- |align=left|Union Solidarity and Development Party (USDP)||7||13 |- |align=left|Kachin State Democracy Party (KSDP)||3||3 |- |align=left|Lisu National Development Party (LNDP)||2||2 |- |align=left|Shan Nationalities League for Democracy (SNLD)||1||3 |- |align=left|Unity and Democracy Party of Kachin State (UDPKS)||1||1 |- |align=left|National Unity Party (NUP)||0||11 |- |align=left|Independent||0||1 |- |} 2015 results are as of 20 November 2015. 4 Ethnic Affair Ministers posts won by NLD's candidates are included in total 26 seats.https://twitter.com/rshorsey/status/667735871420936192 ==See also== *State and Region Hluttaws *Pyidaungsu Hluttaw ==References== Category:Unicameral legislatures Category:Kachin State Category:Legislatures of Burmese states and regions
